definitions.definition: To take or seize from an unwilling person by physical force , menace , duress , torture , or any undue or illegal exercise of power or ingenuity .
examples: to extort contributions from the vanquished
to extort payment of a debt

definitions.definition: To obtain by means of the offense of extortion .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To take or seize from an unwilling person by physical force , menace , duress , torture , or any undue or illegal exercise of power or ingenuity .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , law ) To obtain by means of the offense of extortion .
( transitive and intransitive , medicine , ophthalmology ) To twist outwards.
